# Problem 2

```{r, fig.cap="Age vs Height"}
names <- c("Jon", "Joe", "Jack")
ages <- c(25, 23, 21)
heights <- c(68, 72, 64)
df <- data.frame(name=names, age=ages, height=heights)
knitr::kable(df)
plot(ages, heights, xlab = "Age", ylab = "Height")


```


# Problem 3

```{r}
squarefive <- function(value = 2) {
  return((value*value)+5)
}
# Testing 3 in our function
squarefive(3)
# Testing the default value
squarefive()
```
